What are the treatments for Tourette syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Tourette syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Tourette Disorder Overview  - Genetic Testing Registry: Tourette Syndrome  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Gilles de la Tourette syndrome   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabili
